title: Outsiders Win The IEM Rio ‘CS:GO’ Major
description: The first Major on Brazilian soil has concluded with a surprising winner.

title: Are ‘Immunity Debt’ Claims After Covid-19 Precautions Accurate Or Misinformation?
description: The claim is that such "immunity debt" has led to the recent surges in respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) infections among young children.

title: IEM ‘CS:GO’ Tournament To Return To Brazil In 2023
description: The success of the IEM Rio Major currently taking place in Brazil has resulted in ESL committing to another year of CS:GO in the South American country.

title: Andor’s Brilliant Prison Trilogy Takes ‘Star Wars’ To New Heights
description: Andor's prison trilogy is the best Star Wars has been since the original films.

title: Ancient Parrot Bone Unearthed In New Mexico Is From Lost American Parrot
description: An important reminder that the ecology of the past, even the recent past, can be very different from what we see today

title: Microsoft Confirms Surface Pro 9’s Revolutionary Decision
description: Microsoft's Surface Pro 9 has a secret inside its design, a secret that will be unlocked next year.

title: The Future Of Sustainable Farming: Amy Yoder Applies Her Passion For Sustainable Agriculture To Drive Change In The Industry
description: Q: Beyond your product and technology, what are some of the other areas within agtech that you think are cutting edge? A: I'm going to say the really evolved GPS technology.

title: Three Trends Coming Out Of Money20/20
description:
We are well past 2020, but fintech’s iconic conference, M20/20 is still humming with possibility and the future.

Coming out of the event, after 100+ conversations, three themes stood out.

title: A Psychologist Tells You Why You Need To Escape The Toxic World Of Self-Help
description: Self-help sells. But it may not lead to self-improvement.

title: Ferrari Finances Trump Aston Martin’s, But Powerful Backers Can Sponsor Electric Fightback
description: Ferrari’s profitability continues to accelerate while its rival and financial-basket case Aston Martin’s losses worsen. But despite these contrasting fortunes, the impressive electric technology available from Aston Martin’s shareholders might set up a come-from-behind rally.

title: How To Get Away With Corporate Murder: Unbundling And Disrupting Pharmacy Benefit Managers (Part 1)
description:
The question “Do PBMs add value or abuse their position?”, misses the point. The better question is: Is there a better model than the current PBM model?”

PBMs need to consider that when your house is on fire, you don’t worry about the knicknacks inside before rushing out the door.

title: How To Get Away With Corporate Murder: Unbundling And Disrupting Pharmacy Benefit Managers (Part 2)
description:
Smart companies are embracing network effects and platform business strategies for a reason: they grow faster, scale more efficiently, are more profitable, and see higher valuations by investors. Platforms also now dominate formerly plodding industries. 

It’s time PBMs start paying attention.

title: SSL Brings Its Audio Knowhow In The Intelligent Connex USB Microphone
description: The Connex USB microphone form SSL is great for voiceovers, podcasts, live streaming and even recording music. It's a versatile tool that makes all the adjustments to record or stream.

title: NASA’s Troubled Microwave Oven-Sized Spacecraft Will Finally Reach The Moon Today
description: CAPSTONE will demonstrate a new spacecraft-to-spacecraft navigation technique to help NASA's future Artemis missions to the Moon.

title: BIG BROTHER IS WATCHING YOU: ALEC’s Doublethink Attack On America’s Free Markets
description: The American Legislative Exchange Council is committed to "free markets." It has crafted an "Eliminate Political Boycotts Act." The act is an iconic example of "doublethink" as explained by George Orwell in his classic novel "1984." Keeping markets free requires taking away the freedom of others.

title: Google Blasts Bipartisan Bill For Good Faith Negotiation On Network Use In South Korea
description: Enjoying more than a quarter of South Korea’s total bandwidth and record profits in 2021, Google wants network access for free.

title: 4 Kitchen Appliances That Can Kill You But May Look Innocent
description: The stove and oven aren't the only potentially dangerous items in your kitchen.

description: How to solve today's Wordle.

title: Today’s ‘Quordle’ Answers And Clues For Sunday, November 13

title: Why This Puzzling New Image Of Jupiter Could Help Us Life Beyond Earth
description: A new instrument called the Keck Planet Finder could help astronomers identify Earth-like planets orbiting distant stars.
